name: Simmons & Simmons LLP
membership: Law Society, British Chamber of Commerce, multiple national bar associations, European Competition Lawyers Forum, IBA
goal: Simmons & Simmons LLP is an international law firm, with 20 offices in Europe, the Middle East and Asia. Simmons & Simmons applies considerable expertise to all business sectors but focuses on: asset management and investment funds, financial institutions, life sciences and technology, media and telecommunications (TMT). It also focuses on the energy and infrastructure market.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Simmons & Simmons LLP monitors EU initiatives, policies and legislative files in a number of areas, including financial regulation, corporate law, intellectual property law, competition, internal market, digital single market, healthcare, energy and environmental law.
